summary: Add a new follower to skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, please comment and teach me so that I can improve and bring more mods to this community !

[b]version 1[/b]
Name : Zor The Great
Location : Sleeping Giant Inn
Race : Nord
Armor: Daeric Set without Helmet
Weapon : Enchanted Daeric Great Sword Shock and Twin Enchanted Dearic Dagger Absort Health

[b]Installation
[/b]1.Extract the 7z and copy the .esp file to \Skyrim\Data
2.Run Skyrim laucher and from data file tick Zor the Great.
author: Kenway93
